DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide new knowledge : - Integration rehabilitation highly specialized gynaecological department . - Development test individually adapt rehabilitation process . - Needs rehabilitation among woman gynaecological cancer . - Connection adult attachment style woman gynaecological cancer quality life , rehabilitation need symptoms depression /PTSD .
